item_description: Procedure (except a minor procedure) on a patient by a specialist in the practice of the specialistâ€™s specialty of emergency medicine at a recognised emergency department of a private hospital, in conjunction with an attendance on the patient by the specialist described in item 5001, 5004, 5011, 5012, 5013, 5014, 5016, 5017 or 5019 (Anaes.)
rationale: The note describes a concussion following a bicycle accident with reassurance and education, no procedure performed, and no evidence of a specialist emergency medicine procedure. The management does not include any procedure beyond reassurance, which fails to meet the requirement of a 'procedure (except a minor procedure)' in a specialist emergency medicine setting.
citations: Patient 11 years old with history of bicycle accident involving head and leg impact, with brief loss of consciousness.
Management: Reassurance, education on short-term and long-term effects of concussion; advice to return to ED if concerns arise in next 24-48 hours.
